subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The veteran catcher Brad Ausmus and the Los Angeles Dodgers agreed on a one-year contract worth $1 million. A three-time Gold Glove winner, Ausmus spent the last eight seasons with Houston and batted .218 with 3 home runs and 24 runs batted in in 81 games last year. He will back up the All-Star catcher Russell Martin. ¶Omar Vizquel will go to spring training with the Texas Rangers, who want him to mentor the 20-year-old shortstop Elvis Andrus. An 11-time Gold Glove winner, Vizquel, 41, agreed to a minor league deal. viz.
